mn134:1.2: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
mn134:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā lomasakaṅgiyo sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṁ nigrodhārāme.
mn134:2.1: Atha kho candano devaputto abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṁ nigrodhārāmaṁ obhāsetvā yenāyasmā lomasakaṅgiyo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho candano devaputto āyasmantaṁ lomasakaṅgiyaṁ etadavoca:
mn134:2.3: “Na kho ahaṁ, āvuso, dhāremi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn134:2.4: Tvaṁ panāvuso, dhāresi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañcā”ti?
mn134:2.5: “Ahampi kho, bhikkhu, na dhāremi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn134:2.6: Dhāresi pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattiyo gāthā”ti?
mn134:2.7: “Na kho ahaṁ, āvuso, dhāremi bhaddekarattiyo gāthā.
mn134:2.10: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, āvuso, dhāresi bhaddekarattiyo gāthā”ti?
mn134:2.11: “Ekamidaṁ, bhikkhu, samayaṁ bhagavā devesu tāvatiṁsesu viharati pāricchattakamūle paṇḍukambalasilāyaṁ.
mn134:2.12: Tatra bhagavā devānaṁ tāvatiṁsānaṁ bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca abhāsi:
mn134:4.1: Evaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhikkhu, dhāremi bhaddekarattiyo gāthā.
mn134:4.2: Uggaṇhāhi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca;
mn134:4.3: pariyāpuṇāhi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca;
mn134:4.4: dhārehi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn134:4.5: Atthasaṁhito, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddeso ca vibhaṅgo ca ādibrahmacariyako”ti.
mn134:5.1: Atha kho āyasmā lomasakaṅgiyo tassā rattiyā accayena senāsanaṁ saṁsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena sāvatthi tena cārikaṁ pakkāmi.
mn134:5.2: Anupubbena cārikaṁ caramāno yena sāvatthi jetavanaṁ anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāmo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā lomasakaṅgiyo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
mn134:5.3: “Ekamidāhaṁ, bhante, samayaṁ sakkesu viharāmi kapilavatthusmiṁ nigrodhārāme.
mn134:5.4: Atha kho, bhante, aññataro devaputto abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṁ nigrodhārāmaṁ obhāsetvā yenāhaṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho, bhante, so devaputto maṁ etadavoca:
mn134:5.6: Evaṁ vutte, ahaṁ, bhante, taṁ devaputtaṁ etadavocaṁ:
mn134:5.7: ‘na kho ahaṁ, āvuso, dhāremi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn134:5.8: Tvaṁ panāvuso, dhāresi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañcā’ti?
mn134:5.9: ‘Ahampi kho, bhikkhu, na dhāremi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn134:5.10: Dhāresi pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattiyo gāthā’ti?
mn134:5.11: ‘Na kho ahaṁ, āvuso, dhāremi bhaddekarattiyo gāthā.
mn134:5.14: ‘Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, āvuso, dhāresi bhaddekarattiyo gāthā’ti?
mn134:5.15: ‘Ekamidaṁ, bhikkhu, samayaṁ bhagavā devesu tāvatiṁsesu viharati pāricchattakamūle paṇḍukambalasilāyaṁ.
mn134:5.16: Tatra kho bhagavā devānaṁ tāvatiṁsānaṁ bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca abhāsi:
mn134:5.21: Evaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhikkhu, dhāremi bhaddekarattiyo gāthā.
mn134:5.22: Uggaṇhāhi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca;
mn134:5.23: pariyāpuṇāhi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca;
mn134:5.24: dhārehi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn134:5.25: Atthasaṁhito, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddeso ca vibhaṅgo ca ādibrahmacariyako’ti.
mn134:5.28: Sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca desetū”ti.
mn134:6.2: “Na kho ahaṁ, bhante, jānāmi taṁ devaputtan”ti.
mn134:6.4: Candano, bhikkhu, devaputto aṭṭhiṁ katvā manasikatvā sabbacetasā samannāharitvā ohitasoto dhammaṁ suṇāti.
mn134:6.5: Tena hi, bhikkhu, suṇāhi, sādhukaṁ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī”ti.
mn134:6.6: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā lomasakaṅgiyo bhagavato paccassosi.
mn134:8-13.10: evaṁ kho, bhikkhu, paccuppannesu dhammesu saṁhīrati.
mn134:8-13.11: Kathañca, bhikkhu, paccuppannesu dhammesu na saṁhīrati …pe…
mn134:8-13.12: evaṁ kho, bhikkhu, paccuppannesu dhammesu na saṁhīrati.
mn134:14.18: Attamano āyasmā lomasakaṅgiyo bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandīti.
